data.name: Ashbourne
data.detailed_description:
ONGOING DEVELOPMENT

Players may notice large quality of life and content updates between June and October 2017. While Ashbourne is a complete game, development is ongoing.


About the Game

Ashbourne is a non-fantasy open world role-playing game set in an immersive medieval world.

Take on the role of Alexander Marshal, a knight of the Endewyn empire, as you battle on behalf of your empire with the aim of protecting Endewyn's honour, and it's people. Players will help to lead Endewyn to battle, wiping out enemies and anything else that stands in the way.

Features


Quest-based story, with optional side activites
Follow the quest-based story of Ashbourne through Alexander's eyes, with optional side activities around the world to complete.

Fluid combat system, allowing different styles of combat
Ashbourne's contains a fluid combat system which allows players to deliver fatal attacks to enemies using an array of deadly weapons, all of which have different styles of combat which the player can adapt to.

Immersive 15th century world
Ashbourne is based in an immersive medieval world in which dynamic lighting, weather and time of day which can allow different atmospheres and influence NPC behaviour whilst exploring.

Multi-choice dialogue system
The player's choice of dialogue can alter the path which they follow in the world. Tied into a respect and loyalty system, values fluctuate based on dialogue choices and actions.

Economy
Sell unneeded goods found around the world to merchants for extra money, or you can gamble for coin by playing Alea in any tavern in Endemyr.

data.short_description: Ashbourne is a story-based non-fantasy open world action role-playing game. Take on the role of Alexander Marshal, a knight of the Endewyn empire, as you battle on behalf of your empire to protect Endewyn's honour, and it's people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4150 / AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 Ti / AMD Radeon™ HD 7870 - 2GB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500k / AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 - 4GB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4150 / AMD FX™ 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4150 / AMD FX™ 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
